review: We are enjoying the fire stick. We can now get rid of our satellite. We can watch the shows we normally watch on satellite by using Hulu, Netflix and Amazon Prime. Thank you.
author: Lorraine Cook

review: nice looking unit but was not compatable with my televisions.unit was shipped back at 4:30 pm by ups. thanks for your help in this matter. jack mckinnon

review: Best Bang for your buck. Although i love Google and everything they do but his highly out matches the chromecast. Plus i got it for $20 as an amazon prime exclusive.

review: We orders the fire stick in December and I am still waiting for it they said until February 13 is when it goes out I wish I would of knew that before I orders it

review: easier to us than expected  excellent entertainment value

review: I have an Apple TV box also, the Firestick is much easier to use, may sell the Apple box and buy another Fire Stick.Price is better than the Apple product also.

review: I'm getting interrupts due ￼to buffering. My high speed modem/router is less than 50 feet away and speed measured on laptop near TV is  50 mbps down/12 mbps up .  I'm assuming my speed is more than adequate so I'll be reaching out to technical support for help.
author: H. Beckham "Hank"
